summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'ZING', 'template-free' | Integrating ab initio and template-based algorithms for protein-protein complex structure prediction | ZING is a method to identify and combine high-confidence protein-protein complex structure predictions of a template-free method (ZDOCK) with a template-based method (SPRING) | python ZING.py [-h] [-zdir zdres] [-sdir spres] | -h, --help show this help message and exit
summary.name: AVAILABILITY:ZING
